pullRequest.title: 3836, 3837, 3838 - several minor refactorings
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

moved unit tests for configuration classes into the same package as the classes under test
renamed one unit test
removed apparently outdated setting maxMessageCount from templates and code
removed reference to ineffective setting contactPointfrom configuration template for broker

Related issues
closes #3836
closes #3837
closes #3838
Pull Request Checklist

[ X ] All commit messages match our commit message guidelines
[ X ] The submitting code follows our code style
[ X ] If submitting code, please run mvn clean install -DskipTests locally before committing

commit.message: chore(gateway): move config test into proper package
fix(broker): removed obsolete reference to maxMessageCount

fix(broker): removed reference to ineffective 'contactPoint'

This setting had no effect, because in EmbeddedGatewayCfg.init() it gets overwritten to the address of the networks internal api

nodes.bodyText: Nit: as this is testing configuration parsing and not just the BrokerCfg class, I'd leave it as ConfigurationTest.
